name: LD_41 Undead Medieval Cowboy
description: This game takes your classic turn-based RPG and side-scrolling shooter and puts them into one. As an undead medieval cowboy, you have been awakened from the dead to destroy 3 evils. This was done for the Ludum Dare 41 COMPO portion.All artwork was done with Adobe Illustrator and the animations in Spriter. Have fun!!!!
